comment: Peptidyl-carrier protein is pcp domain of the enzyme itself [KO:K15646].
definition: ATP + L-allo-Isoleucine + Peptidyl-carrier protein <=> AMP + Diphosphate + L-allo-Isoleucyl-[peptidyl-carrier protein]

orthologs.K15646: coronamic acid synthetase CmaA, adenylation and thiolation didomain protein [EC:6.2.1.46]

name: L-allo-isoleucine:[peptidyl-carrier protein] ligase (AMP-forming)
